Bahamas.national_dish: Crack conch with peas and rice

Czech Republic.national_dish: roast pork with dumplings and sauerkraut

Eritrea.national_dish: Zigini with injera, Gored gored, raw meat

Laos.national_dish: Tum Mak Hoong (Som Tum, its Thai name)
